testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from businesses who found success with our platform

testimonial1.name: Ahmed Al-Saeed
testimonial1.content: Amazing platform that saved us a lot of time and effort in finding suppliers. We received diverse and competitive offers in record time.

testimonial2.name: Fatima Al-Zahrani
testimonial2.content: Excellent experience! Professional suppliers and very competitive prices. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for reliable suppliers.

testimonial3.name: Khalid Al-Otaibi
testimonial3.content: I used the platform to request kitchen equipment specifications and received excellent offers. Communication with suppliers was smooth and professional.

about.title: About Our Platform
about.description: We are dedicated to connecting talents with government opportunities, fostering transparency, efficiency, and shared success.
about.missionDescription: To empower individuals and businesses by providing a seamless and transparent platform for government bidding, ensuring fair access and optimal outcomes for all participants.
about.visionDescription: To be the leading platform for government procurement, recognized for our innovation, integrity, and commitment to community development and economic growth.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
introduction.paragraph2: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

dataCollection.title: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
dataCollection.paragraph1: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

dataUsage.title: Use of Your Personal Data
dataUsage.paragraph1: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes: To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service. To manage Your Account: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.

userRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
userRights.paragraph1: You have the right to access, update or to delete the information We have on You. Whenever made possible, you can access, update or request deletion of Your Personal Data directly within Your account settings section. If you are unable to perform these actions yourself, please contact Us to assist You.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.paragraph1: We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the 'Last updated' date at the top of this Privacy Policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.paragraph1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: By email: support@eetmad.com

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.introduction: Welcome to Eetmad. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.section1Content: By creating an account or using any part of our service, you confirm your acceptance of these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you may not access or use the service.
terms.section2Content: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.
terms.section3Content: You may not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You agree to comply with all local laws regarding online conduct and acceptable content. Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to, harassment, spamming, and distributing malicious software.
terms.section4Content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Eetmad and its licensors. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of Eetmad.
terms.section5Content: In no event shall Eetmad, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the Service; (iii) any content obtained from the Service; and (iv) unauthorized access, use or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence) or any other legal theory, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damage, and even if a remedy set forth herein is found to have failed of its essential purpose.
terms.conclusion: These Terms and Conditions are effective as of November 16, 2025.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.fetchError: Failed to load FAQs. Please try again later.
faq.noFaqsFound: No FAQs found at the moment.
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our platform and services

questions.timelines: How long does it take to get offers?
questions.payments: How does the payment process work?
questions.quality: How do you ensure supplier quality?

answers.timelines: Offers usually start arriving within 24 hours of posting the request. In most cases, you get several offers within two days. The duration depends on the type of request and its complexity.
answers.offers: The number of offers varies depending on the type of request and geographic area. On average, requests receive 5-10 offers from different suppliers. Clear and detailed requests attract more offers.
answers.payments: We do not directly intervene in the payment process. Financial agreements are made between the two parties directly. We recommend using safe and documented payment methods. We provide an optional contract template to document the agreement.
answers.quality: We verify all suppliers before accepting them on the platform. We request commercial registration and official documents. We have a comprehensive rating system from users. We continuously monitor supplier performance and take action against violators.

timelines.question: How long does it take to get offers?
timelines.answer: Offers usually start arriving within 24 hours of posting the request. In most cases, you get several offers within two days. The duration depends on the type of request and its complexity.

offers.question: How many offers to expect?
offers.answer: The number of offers varies depending on the type of request and geographic area. On average, requests receive 5-10 offers from different suppliers. Clear and detailed requests attract more offers.

payments.question: How does the payment process work?
payments.summary: Direct agreements between parties with safe payment methods
payments.answer: We do not directly intervene in the payment process. Financial agreements are made between the two parties directly. We recommend using safe and documented payment methods. We provide an optional contract template to document the agreement.

quality.question: How do you ensure supplier quality?
quality.answer: We verify all suppliers before accepting them on the platform. We request commercial registration and official documents. We have a comprehensive rating system from users. We continuously monitor supplier performance and take action against violators.
